title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Ordinary and partial differential equations; finite difference schemes implicit and explicit types; accuracy, convergence and stability; method of characteristics; finite element method - variational and weighted residual formulations; applications to steady and unsteady flows; pollutant dispersion; flood wave propagation; tidal model; applications with computer programming.
